Description: We, voestalpine Turnout Technology Egypt, are in search of an Order Planning & Stock Management expert to join us in maintaining impeccable order fulfillment and inventory control. As part of our team, you will be responsible for forecasting demand, coordinating with production, and optimizing stock levels to meet customer needs. Your organizational skills and ability to balance supply and demand will be pivotal in minimizing costs of our turnout manufacturing plant and maximizing customer satisfaction. If you're a meticulous planner with a background in inventory management, we invite you to apply and help us ensure a steady flow of products while keeping costs in check. Previous experience in the field of turnout manufacturing or any related field is well appreciated.Starting Date: November 2023Skills
Skills:
Forecast customer demand and develop efficient order fulfillment strategies to meet sales goals.
Collaborate with production teams to align manufacturing schedules with demand forecasts.
Monitor inventory levels, perform regular stock reconciliations, and implement measures to prevent overstock or shortages.
Analyze historical sales data and market trends to refine order planning and stock management strategies.
Work closely with sales and customer service teams to ensure accurate order processing and on-time deliveries.
